title: Move from OSX to Windows
body: I am currently using OSX for day-to-day development work, but would love to have the option to move to Windows.

comments.body: This is my exact use case and sentiments.
Everything is working swimmingly for me and my WSL installs for Un*x use - https://1drv.ms/p/s!AsBlZbBf72iNnZoZn0eLi-ywKYEerg outlines my steps - WSL making OSX really unneeded expense these days ;)
Okay here is your recipe for success.
